Nice treatment. Care patients. Timely treatment.
An experience specialist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Kiran exceeded my expectations during my wisdom teeth extraction. The care and comfort provided were exceptional, and I experienced no pain throughout the procedure. Dr. Kiran's reassuring demeanor instills trust, making the entire process smoother. I highly recommend this doctor for anyone in need of dental care—truly a professional with a patient-centered approach.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
** *** *** **** ******* * **** *********  ** *** *****.
He is very professional, supportive when explaining the process. Also does not recommend any high level medication or reports at the first analysis itself. Instead his positive approach and right treatment has sorted out issue at the beginning stage.
Treatment place also looks so warm, hygienic and Comfortable.
My family have been pleased with your service and strongly recommend Dr.Kiran for any dental issues.
I’m happy that I’m at the right hands for oral health.
Thank you doctor !!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The care and sincere efforts to ensure waiting time is very very less is unique and the Doctors and their team needs our heartfelt appreciation

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: My experience has been really good. Both doctor Kiran and Anupama are very good at their work. People unnecessarily feared me of root canal treatment but I  didn’t feel any kind of pain during the treatment . I highly recommend both these doctors for any dental issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor has a very calm and composed approch. He explained the problem really.well.and provided multiple options on treatment. There were cheaper to expensive soulutions but he did not push for anything specific. He wanted me to choose based on my budget. I highly recommend him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
The overall experience was Excellent!
Dr. Kiran is really efficient with his Professional Skills. He extracted two wisdom teeth of same side within 30 mins. Thank you for making my dental experience as painless as possible.  Also thanks to Dr.Anupama for motivating me for my further dental concerns.

I would highly recommend Tooth lounge.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had my initial examination done by Dr. Anupama, got my cleaning done by Dr. Sakshi and Dr  Kiran did my wisdom tooth extraction. The doctors were very patient and clearly explained the procedures. The entire procedure went on smoothly and painfree.   My search for a good dental clinic ends here. Would highly recommend the clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr explained the toothache issues with xray images and even I opted for removal of the tooth because of unbearable pain, he advised me to don't take decision at this time and asked me to take medicines for 3 days and come back. Really that is a very good advice, else I might have lost one tooth. Thanks doctor.

review: I was in severe pain for 2 days. Could not get any appointment for removal. Dr Kiran was out of station but he said he can come and help even if it’s a Sunday if my pain is more.. he came back and did the procedure and he was quite patient with me throughout. I am happy some reviews like this online helped me decide to call him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Visited Dr Kiran D N for upper wisdom teeth extraction which was erupted from long time.Dr was very professional and took utmost care during entire treatment.Teeth was removed in just 5 mins. Clinic was very clean,  hygienic and all safety measures were taken considering current situation.I would definitely recommend Dr Kiran for dental treatment

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Went for toothache which was due to a failed RCT done years back. Doc recommended to extract the tooth as it was in a really bad shape and badly infected. Got it extracted after a round of anti biotics and the extraction took 15 mins including anaesthesia. Happy with the treatment.
